title: Gantry Build Manifest
description: Describes the products generated by running 'gantry build'.

manifestEntry.title: Entry Type
manifestEntry.description: The type of entry within the manifest.

serviceImage.title: Service Image
serviceImage.description: A container (i.e. Docker) image for a given service.

image.title: Image Name
image.description: The complete image name, including any tags.

source.title: Source Dockerfile
source.description: Relative path to the Dockerfile used to build the image.

serviceDockerCompose.title: Docker Compose
serviceDockerCompose.description: A service group configured for deployment with Docker Compose.

is-deployable.title: Can the compose file be deployed?
is-deployable.description: Setting this to `false` indicates that the folder containing the docker-compose.yml doesn't contain all of the resources for it to be deployed.

type.title: Manifest Identifier
type.description: The identifier used to indicating this a gantry build manifest.
